alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Richland; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wibaux, southeastern Dawson and southeastern Richland Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 526 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Skaar to 8 miles east of Glendive. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wibaux, Hodges and Yates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
